title: Fairview Apartments Puyallup!
posting_body: ['Current Availability', '#10 - $1750 2x1 975 sq ft available now', 'Video: https://youtu.be/zpe2bd3BzMk', 'Application Link: <URL>', 'Description', 'At Fairview Apartments, experience fine living.', 'Be sure to come for a visit to check out the current floorplan options.', 'The community staff is ready for you to come take a tour.', 'This community offers residents a wide variety of amenities and features including high-speed internet access and smoke free options.', 'Drop by to find out the current floorplan availability.', 'Apartment features:', '*Huge living room', '*Great storage', '*Patio', '*Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Building features:', '*12 Mo+ leases available', '*Pet Friendly', 'Lease details:', '-Application fee: $48 per adult', '-Security deposit: $750 - $250 is due with the application to hold the unit (holding deposit is only refundable if an application is denied)', '-Income requirements: gross monthly income of 2.5x the monthly rent (if you do not meet this requirement, we do accept a co-signer)', '-Residents are responsible for all utilities', '-Pets: $250 refundable deposit and $25/month per pet.', '2 pet maximum', 'Rental Terms:', '-Rent: $1750', '-Application Fee: $48', '-Security Deposit: $750', 'Pet Policy:', '-Cats allowed', '-Dogs allowed', 'Have Questions?', 'Ready to Tour?', 'Call/Text Ritchie at', 'show contact info', 'or email: <URL> to schedule a tour', 'NOTE: Pictures are of other apartments at this building intended to show style and finishes but not necessarily the exact floor plan of the advertised apartment.', '***Professionally managed by Pilot Property Management and apartments are available on an equal opportunity basis.', 'Pricing may vary based on the time of application, lease duration, and move-in date.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
